description: Asset database for structured scene generation

primitive:box.xml_template: <body name="{name}" pos="{pos}" quat="{quat}"><geom name="{name}_geom" type="box" size="{size}" mass="{mass}" rgba="{rgba}"/></body>

primitive:sphere.xml_template: <body name="{name}" pos="{pos}" quat="{quat}"><geom name="{name}_geom" type="sphere" size="{size}" mass="{mass}" rgba="{rgba}"/></body>

primitive:cylinder.description: Parametric cylinder with custom radius and height
primitive:cylinder.xml_template: <body name="{name}" pos="{pos}" quat="{quat}"><geom name="{name}_geom" type="cylinder" size="{size}" mass="{mass}" rgba="{rgba}"/></body>

primitive:capsule.description: Parametric capsule with custom radius and length
primitive:capsule.xml_template: <body name="{name}" pos="{pos}" quat="{quat}"><geom name="{name}_geom" type="capsule" size="{size}" mass="{mass}" rgba="{rgba}"/></body>

primitive:ellipsoid.xml_template: <body name="{name}" pos="{pos}" quat="{quat}"><geom name="{name}_geom" type="ellipsoid" size="{size}" mass="{mass}" rgba="{rgba}"/></body>

composite:bin.description: Open-top container with 4 walls and bottom

composite:tote.description: Open-top tote container with 4 walls and bottom

composite:shelf.description: Front-open shelf with back and side walls

table_standard.xml_template: <body name="{name}" pos="{pos}" quat="{quat}"><geom name="{name}_top" type="box" size="0.6 0.4 0.02" pos="0 0 0.73" rgba="0.8 0.6 0.4 1"/><geom name="{name}_leg1" type="box" size="0.05 0.05 0.36" pos="0.5 0.3 0.36" rgba="0.6 0.4 0.2 1"/><geom name="{name}_leg2" type="box" size="0.05 0.05 0.36" pos="-0.5 0.3 0.36" rgba="0.6 0.4 0.2 1"/><geom name="{name}_leg3" type="box" size="0.05 0.05 0.36" pos="0.5 -0.3 0.36" rgba="0.6 0.4 0.2 1"/><geom name="{name}_leg4" type="box" size="0.05 0.05 0.36" pos="-0.5 -0.3 0.36" rgba="0.6 0.4 0.2 1"/></body>

shelf_small.description: Compact shelf unit with two levels
shelf_small.xml_template: <body name="{name}" pos="{pos}" quat="{quat}"><geom name="{name}_frame" type="box" size="0.3 0.15 0.02" pos="0 0 0.88" rgba="0.7 0.7 0.7 1"/><geom name="{name}_shelf_mid" type="box" size="0.3 0.15 0.015" pos="0 0 0.45" rgba="0.8 0.8 0.8 1"/><geom name="{name}_bottom" type="box" size="0.3 0.15 0.02" pos="0 0 0.02" rgba="0.6 0.6 0.6 1"/><geom name="{name}_leg1" type="box" size="0.02 0.02 0.45" pos="0.26 0.11 0.45" rgba="0.4 0.4 0.4 1"/><geom name="{name}_leg2" type="box" size="0.02 0.02 0.45" pos="-0.26 0.11 0.45" rgba="0.4 0.4 0.4 1"/><geom name="{name}_leg3" type="box" size="0.02 0.02 0.45" pos="0.26 -0.11 0.45" rgba="0.4 0.4 0.4 1"/><geom name="{name}_leg4" type="box" size="0.02 0.02 0.45" pos="-0.26 -0.11 0.45" rgba="0.4 0.4 0.4 1"/></body>

cup_ceramic_small.xml_template: <body name="{name}" pos="{pos}" quat="{quat}"><geom name="{name}_body" type="cylinder" size="0.035 0.06" pos="0 0 0.06" rgba="0.9 0.9 0.9 1"/><geom name="{name}_handle" type="box" size="0.005 0.01 0.02" pos="0.04 0 0.05" rgba="0.9 0.9 0.9 1"/></body>

franka_panda.xml_template: <!-- Franka Panda placeholder - would include from Menagerie --><body name="{name}" pos="{pos}" quat="{quat}"><geom name="{name}_base" type="cylinder" size="0.1 0.15" rgba="0.2 0.2 0.2 1"/><geom name="{name}_arm" type="capsule" size="0.05 0.4" pos="0.3 0 0.4" rgba="0.8 0.8 0.8 1"/></body>

box_small.xml_template: <body name="{name}" pos="{pos}" quat="{quat}"><geom name="{name}_geom" type="box" size="0.05 0.05 0.05" rgba="0.7 0.2 0.2 1"/></body>
